Class Message.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.taylorkelly.mywarp.util.Message.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Appendable
    Enclosing class:
    Message

    public static class Message.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Appendable
    Builds Message instances.

      • append

        public Message.Builder append(@Nullable
                              java.lang.Object object)
        Appends the given object.

        null is accepted and will append a String equal to "null".

        Parameters:
        object - the object
        Returns:
        this Builder

      • appendAndKeepStyle

        public Message.Builder appendAndKeepStyle(Message message)
        Appends the elements of the given Message and keeps its styling.

        The appended message may ignore the currently set styling of this Builder and the style of elements appended afterwards may be entirely different.

        Parameters:
        message - the message
        Returns:
        this Builder
        See Also:
        appendAndAdjustStyle(Message)

      • appendAndAdjustStyle

        public Message.Builder appendAndAdjustStyle(Message message)
        Appends the elements of the given Message and adjusts its styling to match the active one on this Builder.

        All styles configured for the given message will be entirely ignored.

        Parameters:
        message - the message
        Returns:
        this Builder
        See Also:
        appendAndKeepStyle(Message)
